author: pierred
msg: Bug fix for 24863: permittedTaglibs.tld and scriptfree.tld do not validate in xml parser

author: pierred
msg: Fixed findFormattingMatch() to properly handle a preferred locale
that specifies a variant. With the old code, 'fr_FR_EUR' would
be matched with 'fr' and not 'fr_FR'.  A Euro currency would therefore
not be displayed properly. This fix takes care of that.

author: pierred
msg: oops, must copy intro.html to taglibs.doc instead of build.doc in target dist-nightly.

author: pierred
